annotations.normalized_text: Chinese Academics of Sciences Wuhan Virology

text: @ScottGottliebMD Evidences showed the viruses could be much possible produced from Chinese Academics of Sciences Wuhan Virology institute as bio weapons. A lab-made bat coronavirus related to SARS has been shown to infect human cells. https://t.co/NgmJI2vND2
